items: Three combination of items (Random for every player)
req.name: Items

1.step: Talk to Martin the Master Gardener. (Chat 2-1-1)
1.subtitle: Getting started

description: Talk to Martin the Master Gardener.
Talk to Frizzy Skernip.
Talk to Elstan.
Talk to Heskel.
Talk to Fayeth.
Talk to Dreven.

7.step: Talk to Martin the Master Gardener. (Chat 2)

description: Talk to Martin the Master Gardener.

8.step: Equip dramen staff/lunar staff and enter the shack.
8.subtitle: Trouble in Zanaris

description: Equip dramen staff/lunar staff and enter the shack.
Talk to the Fairy Godfather.

10.step: Talk to Fairy Nuff for a Symptoms list.

description: Talk to Fairy Nuff for a Symptoms list.

location: Top floor of Dark Wizards' Tower
description: Talk to Zandar Horfyre.
Talk to Malignius Mortifer.

13.step: Dig a spade on the grave to get the Draynor skull.

description: Use a spade on the grave to get the Draynor skull.

14.step: Talk to Malignius Mortifer again to receive the list of three items. (Chat 2)

description: Talk to Malignius Mortifer again to receive the list of three items.
Collect the 3 randomly-picked items. Check the quest journal to see your list of items to collect. (Warning: bring more then one edible since ghasts can make them rotten.)
Clean avantoe: GE, 48 Herblore and kill chaos druids, or 48 Herblore/50 Farming
Baby dragon bones: GE, Defeat a baby dragon
Blue dragon scale: GE, Taverley Dungeon respawn
Grapes: GE, Cooking Guild Respawn
Charcoal: GE, Tai Bwo Wannai Village or Shilo Village General Store
Crushed gemstone:  Fail to cut an opal, jade, or red topaz
Edible seaweed: GE, Fishing Trawler minigame, Sandcrabs
Fat snail: GE, Bruise blamish (level 20), Blood Blamish Snails
Irit Leaf: GE, 40 Herblore and kill chaos druids, or 40 Herblore/44 Farming
Jangerberries: GE, Ogre island in a lake west of Yanille
Jogre bones: GE, Defeat a Jogre
King worms: GE, Gnome Stronghold Swamp respawn
Lime: GE, Buy from Heckel Funch in the Grand Tree
Mort myre fungus: GE, Use your Silver sickle (b) near the logs in Mort Myre
Mort myre pear: GE, Use your Silver sickle (b) near the bushes in Mort Myre
Mort myre stem: GE, Use your Silver sickle (b) near the downed branches in Mort Myre
Nature talisman: GE, Kill Abyssal Leeches in the Abyss
Potato cactus: GE, Kalphite Lair Respawns
Proboscis: GE, Tai Bwo Wannai Cleanup minigame
Raw cave eel: GE, Lumbridge Swamp Cave (Required - 38 Fishing/Fishing rod/Bait)
Red spiders' eggs: GE, Karamja Volcano, Varrock Sewer, Edgeville Wilderness Dungeon
Red vine worms: McGrubor's Wood (spade required)
Raw slimy eel: GE, Lumbridge Swamp Caves/Mort Myre Swamp (Required - 28 Fishing/Fishing rod/Bait required)
Snapdragon: GE, 59 Herblore and kill chaos druids, or 59 Herblore/62 Farming
Snape grass: GE, Hobgoblin Peninsula respawn, Zeah peninsula north-east of the vinery
Uncut diamond: GE, Mining Gem Rocks at Shilo Village Gem Mine, Caskets from Big net Fishing, Waterfall Quest reward
Uncut ruby: GE, Gem Trader stall in Al Kharid, Wall safe cracking in the Rogues' Den (50 Theiving)
Unopened oyster: GE, Killing Sand Crabs, Big net fishing (16 Fishing)
Volencia moss: Mining site in Karamja (Required: Complete the Jungle Potion quest)
White berries: GE, Lava Dragon Isle spawn in the Wilderness, Kill cave crawlers (10 Slayer)

16.step: Equip ghostspeak amulet and talk to Nature Spirit to get Magic Secateurs.

description: Enter the grotto.
Equip ghostspeak amulet and talk to Nature Spirit to get Magic Secateurs.

17.step: Squeeze-through the gap through the wall.
17.subtitle: Battle the Tanglefoot

description: Equip dramen staff/lunar staff and enter the shack.
Squeeze-through the gap through the wall.

18.step: Equip Magic secateurs and defeat Tanglefoot (level 111).

description: Equip Magic secateurs and defeat Tanglefoot.
Pick-up the Queen's secateurs.
Talk to the Fairy Godfather.
